title: Watering
text: Water sparingly — let the topsoil dry out between waterings.

title: Sunlight
text: Most indoor plants prefer bright, indirect light.

title: Fertilizer
text: Feed lightly in the growing season (spring-summer).

title: Humidity
text: Increase humidity for tropical plants by misting leaves.

title: Potting
text: Repot every 1–2 years to ensure healthy root growth.
